---
title: "NotteVault"
description: "Vault that fetches credentials stored using the sdk"
---

# NotteVault

Vault that fetches credentials stored using the sdk

## Methods

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card
    title="__init__"
    icon="function"
    href="__init__"
  >
    Initialize the vault with an empty dictionary to track retrieved credentials
  </Card>
